Clear chat confirm text: Unsaved chat will be gone forever.
Help text:
Search for characters on the left.
Click on an avatar to add it to the bottom-right character area.
Click on a character area avatar to talk with that character.
Press Ctrl+Number to quickly switch talking character.
Click on avatar to the left of input box for images, specials, etc.
Enter to send, Shift+Enter to break line.
Click on chat bubble to insert after it.
Right-click on bubble to edit or delete.
Remove custom char confirm text: Dialogs of the character will appear as text from player after refreshing.
